short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle the YouTube heads-up display (HUD) with shortcut keys.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily control the visibility of YouTube's heads-up display (HUD) with the YouTube HUD Toggle extension. Whether you're watching a video and want a cleaner viewing experience or need quick access to playback controls, this extension allows you to quickly show or hide YouTube's HUD elements with just a click or a keyboard shortcut.

Features:

Toggle HUD Button: A simple, user-friendly button in the popup menu that allows you to toggle the visibility of the YouTube HUD.
Keyboard Shortcut: Use the keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+Shift+Y or Command+Shift+Y on Mac) to quickly hide or show the HUD without interrupting your viewing experience.
Clean, Minimalistic Design: The extension is designed to be lightweight and intuitive, providing exactly what you need without unnecessary clutter.
Donation Link: Support the ongoing development of this extension with an easy-to-access donation link available in the popup.
